title: Teapot And Cover, ca. 1775
creditline: Gift of George B. and Georgiana L. McClellan
description: Pear form with sea serpent form spout and C-scroll handle.  In predominantly manganese palette with blue accents.  One side with a landscape scene with a couple; the young man with a bird and birdcage surrounded by trees. The back with sprigs of roses. The handle and spout with blue outlines.  The lid with sprigs of roses and blue outlines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Teapot And Cover, ca. 1775.
ca. 1775. porcelain. Gift of George B. and Georgiana L. McClellan. 1936-13-1-a,b.
